00038     class PhSceneNode
00039     {
00040     protected:
00041 
00043 
00049         float depth;
00050 
00052                 PhSceneManager* smanager;
00053 
00054     public:
00055 
00057 
00060         PhSceneNode() : depth(0.0f), smanager( NULL )
00061         {}
00062 
00064 
00068         PhSceneNode(PhSceneManager* s, const float& d = 0.0f) : depth(d) , smanager(s)
00069         {
00070                         if(smanager!=NULL) smanager->addNode(this);
00071                 }
00072 
00074 
00077         virtual ~PhSceneNode()
00078         {
00079                 if( smanager != NULL ) smanager->removeNode(this);
00080                 }
00081 
00083 
00088         virtual void onPreRender()
00089         {}
00090 
00092 
00099         virtual void onRender()
00100         {}
00101 
00103 
00108         virtual void onPostRender()
00109         {}
00110 
00112 
00117         inline void setDepth(const float& d) { depth = d; }
00118 
00120 
00125         inline const float& getDepth() const { return depth; }
00126 
00128         inline PhSceneManager* getSceneManager( ) const { return smanager; }
00129 
00131 
00134                 inline void setSceneManager( PhSceneManager* s ) { smanager = s; }
00135
